title: Baked Camembert with balsamic caramelised onions
ingredients: ['2 red onions', '1 fully wooden boxed camembert', '1 garlic clove', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', 'generous glug white wine', '1 tablespoon butter', 'generous glug balsamic vinegar', 'some salt and black pepper to taste', '1 loaf fresh baked Mediterranean bread (shop bought is fine)']
